description: Make this quick roast chicken cooked in red wine and spices with cherries and rosemary for a fragrant and delicious Christmas lunch or dinner.
keywords: Cheat's Roast Chicken With Spiced Sour Cherries
name: Cheat's Roast Chicken With Spiced Sour Cherries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil in an ovenproof frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook chicken, skin-side down, for 8 minutes or until skin is golden and crisp. Turn chicken, then add cherries and wine mixture to pan. Bake for 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve scattered with extra rosemary sprigs.
